text: Luther Curtis Knight, Jr. (born April 14, 1943 in Gulfport, Mississippi, United States) is a former NFL placekicker for the Washington Redskins of the National Football League (1969–1973) and was the NFL's second leading scorer in 1971. During the off-season he worked toward a BBA at the University of Texas. title: Curt Knight
